body.title: Bad Request
body.name: NoHeaders
body.detail: Headers are not provided. Please provide required headers.

body.title: Bad Request
body.name: NoCorrelationId
body.detail: CorrelationId is not provided in x-correlation-id header. Correlation id should be provided in the x-correlation-id header.

body.title: Bad Request
body.name: NoAppOs
body.detail: OS is not provided in the x-app-os header. OS of the device should be given in x-app-os header.

body.title: Bad Request
body.message: Header: X-App-OS can only have one of these values: ios, android
body.name: InvalidAppOs
body.detail: OS should be either android or ios. Currently we aren't supporting other operating systems

body.title: Bad Request
body.name: NoAppVersion
body.detail: x-app-version header not found. Provide app version in x-app-version header

body.title: Bad Request
body.name: NoAppName
body.detail: App name is not provided in x-app-name header. App name should be provided in x-app-name header

body.title: Bad Request
body.name: InvalidAppName
body.detail: App name should be TalkSite. No other names are accepted

body.title: Bad Request
body.name: NoAppCountry
body.detail: Country is not given in x-app-country header. Country should be provided in x-app-country header.

body.title: Bad Request
body.name: InvalidAppCountry
body.detail: Available countries: au. Other countries will be available soon

body.title: Bad Request
body.name: NoDeviceId
body.detail: Device Id is not provided in x-device-id header. Device Id should be provided in x-device-id header

body.title: Bad Request
body.name: NoClientId
body.detail: Client Id is not provided in x-client-id header. Client Id should be provided in x-client-id header

body.title: Bad Request
body.name: NoClientSecret
body.detail: No x-client-secret header is provided. All the client-secrets should be provided in x-client-secret header

body.title: Not Authorized
body.name: NoAuthorization
body.detail: No authorization header is provided headers. Authorization header should be given in headers

body.title: Bad Request
body.message: service id not provided in the input
body.name: NoServiceId
body.detail: No service id provided in the input. Please enter the service id. It may be null or not at all provided

body.title: Bad Request
body.message: Invalid service id is provided in the input
body.name: InvalidServiceId
body.detail: Service id provided in the input is invalid. Please enter the valid service id. It's a combination of servicename, resource name and operation separated by hyphen(-)

body.title: Non Found
body.name: NotFound
body.detail: No data found for the given input. Please check your input

body.title: Internal server error
body.name: InternalServerError
body.detail: Error happened in server while processing request

body.title: Internal server error
body.name: DatabaseError
body.detail: Error happened in the database. It may be due to database unable to process the request.
